House Committee on Merchant Marine and Fisheries
actions.text: Referred to Subcommittee on Merchant Marine.

official_title: A bill to direct the Secretary of the department in which the United States Coast Guard is operating to cause the vessel Jason Collins to be documented as a vessel of the United States so as to be entitled to engage in the coastwise trade.

summary.text: Directs the Secretary of the Department in which the Coast Guard is operating to document a named vessel of the United States with the privilege of engaging in the coastwise trade so long as such vessel is owned by a domestic nonprofit corporation.

titles.title: A bill to direct the Secretary of the department in which the United States Coast Guard is operating to cause the vessel Jason Collins to be documented as a vessel of the United States so as to be entitled to engage in the coastwise trade.
